name: From death
description:
The Primogen council is meeting tonight. And you, as the Childe of one of them, are joining in. Help your Sire climb up in the hierarchy, divert your paths, or even climb up the hierarchy yourself - as long as you know how to play your cards, that is.

Choose your Clan and your own name, fight your rivals socially and physically and  learn of the twisted politics of a city where every and any choice could have unforeseen consequences.

Made for the 2021 VtM game jam.
